title: RedditGPT: Reddit post generator
original_prompt: Act as a copy writer. The goal is to make a popular reddit post. I will provide you the topic, content, and the criteria of the post. You will provide the reddit post. My topic is {Title:"the first prompt Hackathon"}, the context is {[Post context]:The Hackathon has $5000 prize in total; we are giving away 10 chatgpt plus account; we have free prompts workshop during the hackathon;} The criteria is {[Post criteria]:engaging, attractive, follow reddit's best practice}
input1:
Title: "Join Us for the First Ever Prompt Hackathon! 🚀"  
Context: "Get ready to unleash your creativity and innovation at our inaugural Prompt Hackathon! With a total prize pool of $5000, this is your chance to showcase your skills and win big! Plus, we're giving away 10 ChatGPT Plus accounts to lucky participants! Don't miss our free prompts workshop during the event to sharpen your ideas and collaborate with fellow enthusiasts. Whether you're a seasoned pro or just starting out, there's something for everyone. Let's make magic happen together!"  
Criteria: "Engaging, attractive, and follows Reddit's best practices by encouraging community interaction and excitement."

Title: "The Ultimate Prompt Hackathon: Win Big and Learn!"  
Context: "Are you ready to take your prompt crafting skills to the next level? Join us for the first-ever Prompt Hackathon, where creativity meets competition! With a whopping $5000 in prizes and 10 ChatGPT Plus accounts up for grabs, this is an event you won't want to miss! Participate in our free prompts workshop to gain insights and tips from experts, and connect with like-minded individuals. Let's push the boundaries of what's possible together!"  
Criteria: "Engaging, attractive, and adheres to Reddit's best practices by fostering a sense of community and excitement around the event."
input1_ans:
**Title: Join Us for the First Ever Prompt Hackathon! 🚀**

Hey Redditors! 

Are you ready to unleash your creativity and innovation? We’re thrilled to announce our **inaugural Prompt Hackathon**! 🎉 This is your chance to dive into the world of prompts, showcase your skills, and potentially walk away with a piece of our **$5000 prize pool**! 💰

But that’s not all! We’re also giving away **10 ChatGPT Plus accounts** to some lucky participants! Imagine the possibilities with enhanced capabilities at your fingertips! 🤖✨

**What’s in store?**  
- **Free Prompts Workshop:** Join us during the hackathon to sharpen your ideas and collaborate with fellow enthusiasts. Whether you’re a seasoned pro or just starting out, this workshop is designed for everyone! 🛠️
- **Networking Opportunities:** Connect with like-minded individuals, share your ideas, and maybe even find your next collaborator! 🤝
- **Exciting Challenges:** Put your skills to the test with fun and engaging challenges that will push your creativity to new heights! 🌟

**When & Where:**  
[Insert Date & Time]  
[Insert Location/Online Platform]

**How to Participate:**  
1. Sign up [Insert Link]  
2. Join our workshop  
3. Get ready to hack your way to victory!

Let’s make magic happen together! ✨ We can’t wait to see what you create. Have questions? Drop them in the comments below! 👇

Spread the word and tag your friends who might be interested! Let’s make this hackathon an unforgettable experience! 🚀

#Hackathon #Creativity #ChatGPT #Innovation #Community

With a total prize pool of **$5000**, this is your chance to showcase your skills and win big! 🎉 Plus, we're giving away **10 ChatGPT Plus accounts** to lucky participants! 🌟 Don't miss our **free prompts workshop** during the event to sharpen your ideas and collaborate with fellow enthusiasts. Whether you're a seasoned pro or just starting out, there's something for everyone. Let's make magic happen together! ✨

**Criteria:**  
This event is designed to be engaging and attractive, encouraging community interaction and excitement. We want to hear your ideas, see your projects, and celebrate your creativity! Share your thoughts in the comments below, and let’s get the conversation started! What are you most excited to create? 💬👇

**Join us and be part of something amazing!**
input2_ans:
**Title: 🚀 Join the Ultimate Prompt Hackathon: Win Big & Level Up Your Skills! 🎉**

Hey Redditors! 🌟

Are you ready to unleash your creativity and take your prompt crafting skills to the next level? We’re thrilled to announce the **first-ever Prompt Hackathon**—an event where innovation meets competition, and YOU could be a winner! 🏆

**What’s in store for you?**  
💰 **$5000 in total prizes**: Yes, you read that right! We’re giving away a massive prize pool to the most creative minds out there.  
🎁 **10 ChatGPT Plus accounts**: Want to supercharge your prompt game? We’ve got you covered!  
📚 **Free prompts workshop**: Join our expert-led sessions to learn tips and tricks that will elevate your prompt crafting skills. Whether you’re a newbie or a seasoned pro, there’s something for everyone!  

**Why should you join?**  
- **Connect with like-minded individuals**: Meet fellow prompt enthusiasts, share ideas, and collaborate on exciting projects.  
- **Push the boundaries of creativity**: This is your chance to experiment, innovate, and showcase your talent in a supportive environment.  
- **Have fun!**: Hackathons are all about creativity, collaboration, and a little friendly competition.  

**How to participate?**  
Stay tuned for more details on registration and event dates! Mark your calendars and get ready to dive into a world of prompts and possibilities.  

Let’s make history together at the **Ultimate Prompt Hackathon**! Who’s in? 🙌 Drop a comment below if you’re excited or have any questions!  

🔗 [Link to more info] (insert link here)  

#Hackathon #PromptCrafting #CreativityUnleashed #ChatGPT #Community
